Articles.Content:
I'd like to test some launchers that I'm working on with a test mass rather than putting fuel tanks, etc. in the nose of the rocket to simulate the payload. I remember seeing them in one mod pack or another, but I can't remember where now.

Anybody got an idea where I can find dummy test mass parts?

Thanks,

Chuck
Kerbal NRAP, which has not been updated for 0.25. It may work, but it will definitely notify you that it may be incompatible.
